channel.title: Infinite Galaxies in May!
channel.description:
Infinite Galaxies: Empire of the Dying Sun
![Infinite%20Galaxies%20cover|322x500](upload://thaoZsyfnnVPbpGsJipMi36hfr6.jpeg)
Hello! I'm the creator and developer of Infinite Galaxies, a science fiction action-adventure PBTA game that will be released this spring from Grendel's Vault Productions. For this season of Infinite Galaxies, we'll create a new setting, called "Empire of the Dying Sun". Our characters will be protagonists in this story. Please visit [http://www.infinitegalaxies.net] for game materials.
Since this is a Gauntlet Hangouts game, we will be using the usual safety tools, including the X-Card. Please see [http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html] for more information.
Participation in all sessions is highly encouraged, but is not required.
This game is 5 sessions long, happening on Wednesdays at 7PM Eastern US. This game will be recorded and posted on YouTube for later viewing. By joining this game, you are consenting to recording.
May 1: [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb3R1-3UsQtNww5gvGI] May 8: [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb3RGjIgShsCuujgtHl] May 15: [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb3STmgEx9XK3eZPlwE] May 22: [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb3SjF-SIIREb2gaH_1] May 29: [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb3SyNBaSZWnMqQ4Ls_]

item.title: Infinite Galaxies in May!
item.dc:creator: @RoryM

@RoryM wrote:

Infinite Galaxies: Empire of the Dying Sun

Hello! I’m the creator and developer of Infinite Galaxies, a science fiction action-adventure PBTA game that will be released this spring from Grendel’s Vault Productions.
